title: Kamen Sentai Gorider
resume: This 3-part net series will feature five characters who "should not be in this world". These five characters are Kamen Riders Another Agito, Baron, Marika, Lazer, and Blade. These five were either dead or have disappeared at the end of their respective Kamen Rider series. Actors Takanori Kikuchi, Yutaka Kobayashi, Minami Tsukui, Hayato Onozuka, and Takayuki Tsubaki will repirse their respective Rider roles in this spin-off.  The revival of these heroes are linked both to someone manipulating behind the scenes and the "ultimate superhero team" Kamen Sentai Gorider! This all ties into the Kamen Rider and Super Sentai team-up movie, Kamen Rider x Super Sentai: Chou Superhero Taisen!
